channel.title: Kiet's blog on kietpa
channel.description: Recent content in Kiet's blog on kietpa

item.title: How do you even handle errors in Go?
item.description: Error handling is one of the things I’ve struggled with the most while learning Go. The issue lies in where and how to handle these errors. It’s mostly agreed upon that it should be done separately from the main application, but there are many ways to do this and it’s hard to decide which one is the ‘best practice’.

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi, I’m Kiet ðŸ‘‹ # I’m an aspiring software engineer who works in the back-end. I recently graduated from the Sepuluh Nopember Institute of Technology with a bachelor’s degree in Electrical-Engineering (EE).
